Technical Settings
------------------

If you use Worldcraft / Hammer as game editor, please set the light_environment as follows:

Pitch Yaw Roll (Y Z X) : 0 148 0
                 Pitch : -23
            Brightness : 255 253 239 XXX (the XXX / brightness value depends from your map)

For other game editors, please make sure that sun height (point light source) is set to 36 degrees. 
The recommended environment light colour is 255 253 239 (RGB). You will receive better results by 
following this.
